rule.name: reportdatetime
rule.definition: =load( local!value, local!start, /*: fn!datetime(2011,4,15,12,34,56),*/ local!end, 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}SectionLayout'( content:{ 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}ColumnArrayLayout'( columns: { 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}ColumnLayout'( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Start Date", instructions: "Setting this field will change End Date to be one week later", value: local!start, saveInto: { local!start, local!end /*<< fn!todatetime <<fn!caladddays(_,5)*/ } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Start Date", value: local!start, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "End Date", instructions: "Must be one week after Start Date", value: local!end, saveInto: local!end, validations: if( and(not(isnull(local!end)), not(isnull(local!start)), not(todate(fn!caladddays(local!start,5))=todate(local!end))), "End Date must be 7 days after start date", "" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( value: null(), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Default Value", instructions: "Date should be 15 April 2011", value: fn!datetime(2011,4,15,12,34,56), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Default Read-only", instructions: "Date should be 25 December 2011 at 1:23", value: fn!datetime(2011,12,25,12,34,56), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Read-only, No Default", readOnly: true, saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Disabled, No Default", disabled: true, saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Default Read-only and Disabled", disabled: true, readOnly: true, instructions: "Default is 17 April 2014", value: fn!datetime(2014,4,17,12,34,56), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Default Value set from now()", value: now(), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Required", required: true, saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Invalid Value (Not a Date)", value: {"mydate", "mytime"}, instructions: "Input is {'mydate', 'mytime'}", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Null Input", value: null, instructions: "Input is null", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Validation", value: fn!datetime(2014,4,17,12,34,56), instructions: "There should be two validation messages here", validations: { "Validation error message", "Another validation error message" }, saveInto: local!value ) } ) } ) }) )
